name: Mico Popovic
text: Was in there for the first time today! Nice location, on the corner of MacArthur mall. It was a lunch time and most of my company was doing lunch combo which includes Soup or Salad + choice of 7inch pizza or half sandwich! Price at the ‚Ä¶More

text: The food was Excellent! I had the buffalo style cauliflower and it was delightful Delicious. I thought I wasn‚Äôt gonna like it, but it was actually crispy and very flavorful. I took a picture after I was eating but the presentation of  the plated food was what you would expect at a luxury dining experience.

name: Amor Johnson
text: I frequrnt this location often because I work downtown. The waitstaff and hosts are fenominal, but whomever mana the takeout  is consistently rude. This isn't a recent observation of mine or since COVID. This has been a consistent ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashlee A
text: Fairly good location, employees aren‚Äôt the greatest with customer service & work etiquette but they get the job done. Decent sized and the greatest part is that they validated the valet parking for free! Food is consistent to other CPK locations.

name: Arlei Hanna
text: Delicious pizza. Small portions and kind of expensive. Definitely fits the name.

name: B MSOL
text: If not for the extremely friendly manager and hostess we would have paid for our drinks and left. We waited 20 minutes for our drinks and when they finally arrived the drinks were not correct. Afterwards, we wait another 25 minutes before ‚Ä¶More

name: Always Hope
text: There was a server there by the name Johnathan... Absolutely great service great spirit and just amazing... I have not had service like that in a very long time... Jonathan is who would make me want to come back. The food was prompted and ‚Ä¶More

name: Katie Mesich
text: I always get the avocado egg rolls, they are amazing! They also have an awesome flight of sangria, for those who can't make their mind up. The dumplings are so flavorful, they're one of my favorite items to get. Their seasonal menu is ‚Ä¶More

name: Dennis Schwartz
text: One of my top spots for delicious pizza. it was so tasty. the place has a cool atmosphere.

name: Norma Ware
text: Food was very good.  Lex our server was so pleasant and professional.  Liked this location.

name: Imane
text: Good pizza base. The rest is just bad. Basically it‚Äôs like eating good bread with very little cheese on it, dry overcooked chicken, fatty sausage, salad thrown on top( only fresh thing on the pizza). ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Ware
text: We had a great meal Monday night and our server Lez was wonderful. Great experience all around!!!

name: Jennifer Kim
text: I love CPK!! Love the bbq salad with avocado in it. Pizza and pasta are very tasty as well. Food came out pretty fast and service was very good. It‚Äôs good for a small table and a big group as well! You won‚Äôt regret it.üëçüèª

name: john white
text: My wife & I went before a concert at the Norva. I had just an appetizer & drink. The avocado egg rolls were delicious. The Moscow mule was equally good. The service was good. The bill was a little on the pricey side.

name: Keith Kirkland
text: California Pizza Kitchen is about what you'd expect from a national chain.  Clean, we'll designed atmosphere, good service that tries to be one notch above, slightly oversized portions, and predictable food.  It's not a place I'd eat as a ‚Ä¶More

name: Elle Hatton
text: They offer Cauliflower crust pizza now. It's very similar to a flat bread in taste and it's very good!

name: Wilson Dowdy
text: I‚Äôve been to CPK‚Äôs across The USA from here all the way to UCLA and Santa Clarita, this location is definitely top five for sure!  I ordered online about thirty minutes after they opened at 11:30am and man I was expecting a leftover pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Euliver Dizon
text: The CPK at the MacArthur Center Mall has a beautiful ambiance with amazing view of downtown Norfolk, VA. The staff are friendly and prompt with serving their customers. My fire grilled ribeye steak tasted so delicious beyond my expectation and the bleu cheese butter topping accentuated the flavor beautifully.

name: Rustum Rivera
text: They're usually good, but the pizza yesterday was not as fresh. The dough was little bit chewer. I like the entree choices, and they always have specials for kids especially if they're doing great in school.

name: Mark L. Tucker
text: The best sangria hands down! Get the flight.

name: Phillip Daniel
text: Quality food at an affordable price, good portion ratios, just great all around food especially for a chain restaurant

name: Per Inge Dr√•gen
text: Nice place had perfect lunch. Thanks

name: Cody Phelps
text: The pizza was amazing and the service friendly. Try the cauliflower crust of you get the chance

name: Annmarie Candelaria
text: Delicious food and awesome service. First time going and I will say worth every penny

name: Joseph Dieck
text: Food and atmosphere here are always good try the take and back

name: Giovanni Panaro
text: Pricy, but well worth it! The food here is amazing and the wait was fairly short. Their raspberry tea was also perfect. Not too sweet like most places.

name: John Holland
text: Thank you Mike the Manager. Really awesome how you guys are stepping up for the community when so many aren't. Character is revealed when tested.

name: Theresa Nunez
text: Great place! It's one only favorite places to go. The food is always great and so is the service.

name: lucy knapp
text: Delicious food and good customer service.

name: Dorescia Paige
text: Delicious as always, but kind of pricey. I ended up spending $90 for family of four. That's not astronomical, but because it had been years since I'd been there, the prices took me off guard. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ken Jessup
text: Food was excellent however it took an extremely long time to get it

name: Mike Ace
text: Food is fresh and tasty.  I Like it!

name: Kendra Anderson
text: Food was awesome! It was my first time here. The service, however, not so great. Our server was rude to us almost the entire time and gave consistent negative attitude. She may have been having a rough night, I don‚Äôt know, but that‚Äôs not a reason to give poor customer service.

name: Uliana Kolinko
text: Excellent lunch! Soup and Pizza were exceptional! Thank You !‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

name: Online Marketing Shark
text: Mmmmm! Best place for food in the mall, had the bbq chicken pizza lunch special (under 10 bucks before 4 is a steal) with Caesar salad and it was so good! Friday afternoon wasn‚Äôt too busy and service was great, friendly, prompt.

name: Angel Johnson
text: Great staff, very nice.

name: Nikki Porter
text: I don‚Äôt write reviews very often, but I was pretty blown away by this place! The take and bake deal is awesome (you can get an additional pizza to take home with you for $5 with the purchase of any entree), our server Amanda was lovely and ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Rogers
text: The food is always good. Definitely try the cauliflower crust pizza! You won't even know! It is so good and so much healthier! I love knowing I can eat a whole pizza without overloading my body with carbs!

name: Jim
text: So I know California Pizza have a special today for veterans not only was it my birthday, I'm a veteran and currently still serving, So I approached the waitress at the takeout window, I told her I was military and it was my birthday the ‚Ä¶More

text: Place an order online and waited 10 minutes after the time they told me it would be ready to go pick up my order. When I got there, they told me my order wasn't ready and it would be about another 10 min. Went and walked the mall for about ‚Ä¶More

name: Krzysztof Gasienica-Bednarz
text: Went here for lunch and it was surprisingly good for the price. I got a soup as well as a pizza and I‚Äôd recommend it if you‚Äôre into those kinds of things. Service was relatively quick and they were accommodating of a larger party size as well.

name: Nelia Waters
text:
I love everything about this restaurant. The food was delicious, the atmosphere was beautiful, and  my server was wonderful! Her name is Kendall! Much love! I would recommend this restaurant to anyone and everybody!
The Waters!

name: Bruce Johnson
text: This was a pleasant experience at this restaurant. I normally don't like chain restaurants and my previous experiences at other locations including this one was not the best. I must say that has now changed. This location not only ‚Ä¶More

text: This was my first time eating at the establishment and my first time eating Hawaiian pizza.  I must say I am not disappointed.

name: Archie M
text: Our server was ok, but we didn‚Äôt get the lettuce wrap appetizer that we ordered, which is what we actually came for. We were told it was mistakenly served to the wrong table.

name: Clemen Estaya
text: Very good food, staffs courteous and helpful. Highly recommend this place

name: Michael Cain
text: Very nice decor, service and food.

name: MaryLou Ocheltree
text: Ordered the Halibut, Faro, dish - not great but good.  Really wanted to mention the outstanding service - our waitress was a pert young lady by name of Becca - very attentive and informed regarding the menu.  One other outstanding employee ‚Ä¶More

text: Food and staff were great. This 'Take & Bake' is a great deal.

name: Diane Sprecker
text: I have never been to this restaurant  before. The food was excellent.  The waitresses were very on top of their tables. Has a very nice decor. The whole  experience  was enjoyable.

name: Harold Lloyd
text: The mushroom pizza with cauliflower crust is amazing. Great promo deal...with any entree you can get any pizza to go for $5. Service was snappy too.

name: Donna Robison
text: Delicious! Had the shrimp scampi and zucchini w fettuccine. Great taste and low calories

name: Heather Waters
text: I havent been to a CPK in years and I was hoping it wouldnt disappoint and it didnt. Food was great service was great!!

name: Sol Lopez
text: The cauliflower pizza was amazing, and gluten free. They were really friendly and attentive, we all had different allergies, and they accommodated perfectly. Would recommend.

name: D G
text: The food is absolutely fantastic! The customer service is even better!! Abbey is amazing!!

name: Gail Fogle
text: Awesome drinks and food. Lunch specials are great

name: Christina Holland
text: We had Andy as a server and he was absolutely great! I throughly enjoyed the bbq pizza on the cauliflower crust....best pizza I've had in forever! I was pleasantly surprised by how crispy the cauliflower crust was. I think I'll be going back again!!

name: Luis Diaz Jr.
text: Fast service, good food and friendly staff. We were headed somewhere else to eat but the smell of their food drew us in.

name: Karma's Ghosts
text: Our waitress was AMAZING...  Too bad it was her last night or I would have gone back just to have her again!!!  The buffalo cauliflower bites are AMAZING...  Just wish I had known they automatically put blue cheese on them as a garnish...  Otherwise well worth it!!!

name: T. Gafford
text: Located inside the MacArthur Center in Norfolk, VA.  I love the open design at the restaurant. With the high ceilings it seems very airy, almost like we were dining outside.  We had a rather large group of 10 people, however, the waitress handled all are orders with ease.  The pizza & salad were great.

name: Clueless Cue'r
text:
It's good, but the to go is a hit or miss situation, wait wise.

Also it's pretty pricey now that there's "craft pizza" places more commonly now. ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Davis
text: Food was good service was of equal quality BUT we were seated close to a exterior door. Everytime it open( frequently) cold blast of air. a take away for an enjoyable meal experience. Don't sit there in winter.

name: Nithin Ullal
text: Good food nice ambience

name: James McDonald
text: Excellent, good location, easy to find. Food was good as always. Service was wonderful. Our server, Trinity, made our visit even better with her knowledge of the menu and attention to our  dining experience.

name: Windy Hart
text: The food is always great, nice change of pace

name: Melvin C
text: The food was great, tasted great and fresh. I'm giving this place a 5 star because of our waiter, I believe his name was Malcolm and he really made us feel welcome. Great place I would definitely come back.

name: Frances Coronel
text: Waitress was very friendly and the food was mouth watery delicious. Try the margarita pizza - it melts in your mouth! But caution - food is usually very hot upon arrival.

name: Larry Morgan
text: I've been to this location several times. Not sure why I come back other than the pizza. They sit you down and forget you. I have yet to not have to wait 10 to 15 minutes to be served.  They ask what you want them forget you. Your food ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Pender
text: Food and drink very delicious. Price wasn't too bad.

name: Candis Ralph
text: Try the cauliflower buffalo wings a vegetarian must have...

name: Stephen Condra
text: Service is always great. Food is always great. We like to go here sometimes before we see a show at Chrysler Hall. We're never disappointed. They also have cauliflower pizza crust which is amazing for those of us who have to be mindful of carb intake!

name: Kesha S.
text: I love this place! The food is delicious and tastes so fresh. I love the lettuce wraps with shrimp. I also enjoy the California pizza with cauliflower crust. It's so delicious! The prices are great and they will validate your parking.

name: Lisa Nash
text: Awful! Came here at 12:15 for lunch. We waited an hour for our food, which was cold. One order had a hair on it. Will not be coming back...so disappointing.

name: Nicole Hancock
text: My family and I are regular customers here. We've never had any issues with waiting after being seated, service is always prompt for us when we go. The place looks clean, the food always comes out fresh, well made, and delicious. Severs are fairly attentive and friendly. We will continue to be long time customers for this location!

name: Lloyd Vines
text: Good serves

name: Chelsea Williams
text: My fiance' and I love this place and location. Since the weather is in the 80's, we decided to have lunch there today. Our server, Malcolm, is out of this world. He was very knowledgeable, clean, spoke well and checked on us I know at least 3 times. Thank you for the great service, good food and very tasty drinks (Red Berry Sangria).

name: Quon Shines
text: Food was good and the waiter was hilarious  . We had a good time.

name: LINY Girl
text: Food was well-prepared, love the Take and Bake deal, and we had a wonderful waiter, Malcolm, that was extremely cordial and responsive.

name: Bee Cee
text: Amazing staff and food. Came in close to closing and did not feel rushed. We were able to enjoy our food after a long day of dancing.

name: R. L.
text: Very good food spicy cauliflower was a great appetizer. Soup and cob salad were delicious per mom so was the shrimp scampi with zucchini.

name: schapa7800
text: Late evening near their closing time, and they were quite nice to us.  Food was quite good, a pleasant surprise for a chain restaurant in a mall.  Still can't go in there and not remember the singing waiters when it was Castaldi's.

name: Eric Muro
text:
Yall better order them Avacodo Egg Rolls!
Hot daym I walked into this place thinking itd just be alright. After you get the egg rolls you're left thinking the rest better beat that, and it sure as hell did!

name: Rose Williams
text: My favorite pizza restaurant. Lots of choices and always fresh.

name: PAULETTE BRAWNER
text: Malcolm the wait staff was excellent keep him on board with a promotion

name: melissa griffin
text: The food was good not great and the service was good. It took a long time to get in and out because our server to me seemed to have more than she could handle. Also the carpets had a stench to them that was not what I wanted to smell while eating.

name: Nina
text: Workers are too busy to say hi to their customers. I've been standing at the take out section for several minutes and I'm just now getting help after SEVERAL employees made eye contact with me.

name: Jack Jones
text: Great food and decent prices.  Staff is always friendly.

name: Angela Talbert
text: The food was great and service was excellent as well!

name: Jamel Rodman

name: Robert Marcus
text: Clean and friendly, my two favorite things in a restaurant. I usually don't eat in chains, but I have eaten in CPK all over the country and have never been disappointed. I love their Smashed Pea and Barley Soup, and they're salads are "clean," I think the new term is. I enjoy them alot!

name: Bob Lauer
text: Great service and very good food. Manager was exceptional. Entire mall was great experience for Christmas shopping.

name: Tom M.
text: Absolutely abysmal. This was the first time eating at this establishment and it will most certainly be the last. My family and I were seated in a timely manner and afterward, forgotten about for roughly twenty minutes. Upon ordering our ‚Ä¶More

text: A little pricey. Pizza was just okay. Mexican corn was pretty good.  Staff was friendly and attentive.  Location is inside mall. Self pay parking is $1.00 per hr.

name: Shannon Rubin
text: Great food. Sadly the only gluten free Crissy is make with dairy so I couldn't eat it. But my salmon was good.

name: Patricia Spruill
text: I love this place. Great service. Awesome food and relaxing atmosphere!

name: M L
text: Always good ! Never been disappointed!

text: Kitchen was SLOW. Food was tasty but not going back anytime soon.

text: I was a little disappointed when my brother offered to take me and my kids to dinner at CPK. Except for Chick-fila, I avoid chain restaurants like the plague. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenn McClain

text: My favorite place for healthy meals. Love their power bowls and their halibut dish. Convenient and inside of the best mall in town.

name: Harry Jackson
text: For brunch? Quite crazy, actually. The food and service was quite the treat,and we appreciate the effort üòä

name: Laura W
text:
I like this chain and the food is always fresh and plentiful.

text: Go here for the cauliflower crust! Take good company with you, as service is so-so. It's a great place to catch up with friends. The food is great and the atmosphere is friendly.

name: Kayla McCombs

text: This place is freaking delicious. I've been a customer for along time and will always keep coming back. Great food, nice environment, and friendly staff. Plus the best Cesar Salad and Tortilla soup you'll probably ever have.

name: Gabby Rodriguez

text:
Walked in. Received no service.  Left.

text: Great service and tasty lunch

text: Went for lunch during restaurant week. Awesome menu and very quick service. I enjoyed my lunch!

name: Xuan Tang
text: Food is okay is not all that great. The service is really suck..

name: Debra Zervas
text: Nice place for lunch at MacArthur Mall. Healthy choices, my favorite appetizer is the Sonoma Grilled Chicken Flatbread w/Marinated red grapes & double cream Brie, caramelized onions, Parmesan and fresh arugula. Great drinks including non alcoholic and the pizza of course. Nice atmosphere, good service. Very satisfying for a chain.

name: terrah Romano
text: Not as good as usual. My shrimp taste like dirt. And they got rid of the pesto noodles !

name: Sharon Laferty
text:
Nice place for lunch while shopping.
Abby, my server, was prompt and personable. I had the lunch sweetpea carbonara, which was delicious, came with a great luttle salad and superb champagne vinaigrette. Dessert was so good! Overall pleasant experience!

name: Joanne Tuin
text: Relaxing setting within the mall. Attentive service and tasty gourmet pizza.

name: Krystal Price
text: Excellent, extremely fast. Just wish my waitress would have recommended the half salad

name: Jonathan Bradford
text: Great menu with lots of choices. Friendly staff. Very slow lunchtime service. Overpriced for the quality of the food. My chicken Caesar salad had very little chicken (and it was overcooked and dry) and the romaine lettuce was not at all crisp.

name: Jennifer Miller
text: It was good, service was great. They do not validate parking, just free vallet!

name: Amber Clark
text: Speedy friendly service and surprisingly good ribeye. Thank you for a good meal.

name: Ruby Gonzales-Hoffman
text: The ambiance and location!

name: Alex Flecha
text: Great food!

name: James Coleman
text: Service was awesome and the food was great.  Enjoyed the evening there

name: Michael Howard
text: Pizza was good. Dessert was great.

name: Chris Holland
text: Really good!! Good food and service!!

name: Shyrah A. Moran
text: Great food ! Staff was very friendly and polite.

name: Jeanette Zeeb
text: The hype doesn't match the quality. Server was nice but the pizza was super thin and greasy

name: Scott Morehead
text: No lemon with water when asked for both of us. Looking at wonderful pizza with no plates. Usually a decent place.

name: Robyn Frost
text: This is a great place with good food and good service. A little expensive but then again I'm pretty cheap LOL

name: Michele Bullard
text: Wonderful place to eat. And a wonderful staff.

name: DH Hairston
text: Excellent food! Great atmosphere. I'm a regular and will continue to be.

name: Charles Jones
text: Jann was excellent! I stop in when I travel to Norfolk and the service is always great.

name: Stacy M
text: Good service. Try the buffalo califlower!

name: Alan Ballard
text: Staff was friendly and the food was good! This is located inside of the mall.

name: Jacob Thayer
text: Fast and friendly service. Also the Mexican street x clearly was fantastic.

name: Autumn Earnest
text: Usually go here a couple times a year, most notably for the Breakfast with Santa and the Easter Bunny. Foods not bad and you get candid pics with your kids and characters. Becoming a tradition, except this year when we didn't get breakfast. ‚Ä¶More

text: Service was slow. Food was good.

name: Tab itha
text: Friendly service.

name: Kenneth Willandt
text: Good food, good service, all the way around

name: Elmest Guzman
text: Great food great service!!! Get the fried Mac and cheese!!!!

name: Glenn Mitchell
text: Another chain restaurant with good food and a friendly staff.

name: jack Black
text: Food was great, customer service awesome;  however seating comfort prompted me to respond with 4-stars. The seating is very tight while with larger parties. Booth seating is not so bad.

name: Richard Moody
text: Carne Asada pizza. Whoever invented that is a GENIUS! SOOOOOOOOOOOOL GOOD!

name: Christian Ayotte
text:
Ordered a spaghetti turkey meat balls to take out with hot break...

It's very good,  large portion and very taste. ‚Ä¶More

name: William Wade
text: Delicious food Excellent service

name: Mara Cardoza
text: This is known as a tourist spot, because of it's location, so I frankly had low expectations. But the food was quite good and very nicely presented. The staff was courteous and low key and prompt. A place I'd come back to.

name: Michele Ewing
text: Delicious soup for a cold rainy day!  Staff was friendly and fast!

name: Joshua C
text: First time trying this location located in the mall after all of my friends have raved about how good it was. My servers name Rebecca was terrible never once stopped in to check how we were doing and it wasn‚Äôt even busy had to get help from another employee just to get some ranch will not be returning here

name: Ronald Gross
text: Enjoy good food,great people.

name: diane Cross
text: Great pizza and specials

name: Yannis Nevratakis
text: Good food. Can't go wrong with California Pizza

name: Rudy McGwin
text: California Pizza has great food and they honor veterans on Veterans Day with a nice abbreviated menu. Thank you for taking care of our veterans.

name: Victoria Shaw
text: Great service!!! The citrus crush was amazing, probably one of the best made cocktails I've ever had, props to the bartender working today. Fried mac n cheese and bianco flatbread was great and the garlic chicken pizza was great too. Thank you so much for the great first time experience here, we will definitely return!

name: shane sawsiengmongkol
text: Good lunch specials and portions, friendly staff and attentive service. Their personal pizza and the lentil soup is hearty and delicious.

name: Ja'net Beckett
text: They have the best tasting pizza there!  I had the roasting garlic pizza and it was excellent!

name: Hannah Harleman
text: The food is consistently good here and the staff are very friendly even when busy.

name: Bonita Mita
text: The food is delicious. Lots of options to choose from. The prices are a bit high though.

name: Barbara Wilson
text: Always a great meal and service!!
